articles.title: Asked repeatedly to say 'black lives matter,' Mike Pence says 'all lives matter'
articles.description: Vice President Mike Pence declined to say the words "Black lives matter" during an interview with an ABC affiliate in Pennsylvania on Friday, instead saying that "all lives matter."
